import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'SofTrust.UI'; form: FormGroup ngOnInit() { this.form = new FormGroup({}); } }
